title: Mercedes ready to invest $500 mn in Indian EV biz but it has a condition
description: Mercedes-Benz supports India's EV policy with condition of consistent 5% GST for 10 years. Plans $500 million investment. Expanding electric range to 6 models. Calls for collaboration in building charging infrastructure. Emphasizes government support for carbon neutrality.
